pages.title: Scientific automata core
pages.text: Finally, some progress! Feeding forged automata core with computer scientist produced promising result. Core seems able to interact with experience orbs and you should definitely investigate it!

pages.description: Trying to crystallize XP from stored XP in turtle and transform it to abstractium ingots. Ingot cost can be retrieved via $(configuration)

parameters: ingot count, should be positive integer less or equal then 64
returns: True if operation successful, nil otherwise

pages.description: Perform automata crafting for inventory. Inventory should be same, as described on automata crafting recipe. Result will be stored in first empty slot
returns: True if operation successful, nil otherwise
